reviewText: These are Classic DVD's to learn the entire concept of the X factor... Good information never gets old, this DVD's are a great value added to any player who is looking to improve!

I responded to a promotional message for Jim McLean's Ultimate X factor DVD with the expectation that this would be the latest idea for achieving a better golf swing. What I got instead was what appeared to be a DVD dub of an old VHS tape training from the 1980s. I paid too much for old ideas and poor quality visuals.Jim McLean's Ultimate X Factor (2 DVD SET)
